name: oci_field_type_raw
purpose: Tell the raw Oracle data type of the field

return.description: Returns Oracle's raw data type as a string, or FALSE on errors.

notes.description:
In PHP versions before 5.0.0 you must use ocicolumntyperaw instead.
    This name still can be used, it was left as alias of
    oci_field_type_raw for downwards compatability.
    This, however, is deprecated and not recommended.
